# Welcome to the Supply Chain Analytics Dashboard

This comprehensive analysis examines lead time performance across our supply chain, providing critical insights into delivery reliability and operational risk.

## Analysis Overview

**Dataset**: 195 parts analyzed across multiple performance metrics

**Key Metrics Evaluated**:
- Lead time variability and consistency
- On-time delivery performance
- Supplier reliability scores
- Risk categorization (Low, Medium, High, Critical)

## Quick Insights

::: {.callout-warning}
## Critical Finding
**77.9%** of parts are classified as high or critical risk, with an average on-time rate of only **40.1%**
:::

::: {.callout-tip}
## Opportunity
Only **3.6%** of parts demonstrate reliable performance - significant room for improvement through strategic supplier management
:::
